item.title: Some Markdown Grammer Issues
How to write Fraktur g
item.description: I am now increasingly encountering the facktur g (and others) standing for a Lie algebra. Here is a post for how to write them in hand: link.

item.title: Website logistics
item.description: After committing and pushing get stucked: for uncommited changes: git commit -m “Your commit message” discard unstaged changes (note that directly copying from website will give a single - instead of consecutive two -): git checkout – . for “already exists” branch: git branch -d branch_name use link to restore: rebrase and other commands. To create a new blog: terminal (top of the mac computer) – new terminal – type hugo new blog/name.
